trans-unit.source: Configures an import that is associated with a part.
trans-unit.target: 設定與組件相關聯的匯入。

trans-unit.source: The required metadata name.
trans-unit.target: 必要的中繼資料名稱。

trans-unit.source: A function that provides the required metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 提供必要中繼資料值的函式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a constraint to the import requiring the specified metadata name and the value provided by the specified function on the part type.
trans-unit.target: 將限制式加入至匯入，這個匯入需要特定中繼資料名稱及組件類型之特定函式提供的值。

trans-unit.source: An import builder containing the constraint that allows for further configuration.
trans-unit.target: 內含限制式，允許進一步設定的匯入產生器。

trans-unit.source: The required metadata name.
trans-unit.target: 必要的中繼資料名稱。

trans-unit.source: The required metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 必要的中繼資料值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a constraint to the import requiring the specified metadata name and value.
trans-unit.target: 將限制式加入至需要指定之中繼資料名稱及值的匯入。

trans-unit.source: An import builder containing the constraint that allows for further configuration.
trans-unit.target: 內含限制式，允許進一步設定的匯入產生器。

trans-unit.source: Allows the import to receive the default value for its type if the contract cannot be supplied by another part.
trans-unit.target: 允許匯入接收其類型的預設值 (如果無法由另一個組件提供合約的話)。

trans-unit.source: An import builder that allows default values and can be further configured.
trans-unit.target: 允許預設值，且能夠進一步設定的匯入產生器。

trans-unit.source: A function that provides the contract name of the import.
trans-unit.target: 提供匯入之合約名稱的函式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the contract name of the import to the value provided by the specified function on the part type.
trans-unit.target: 將匯入的合約名稱設定為組件類型上的指定函式所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: An import builder containing the contract name that allows for further configuration.
trans-unit.target: 內含合約名稱，允許進一步設定的匯入產生器。

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the import.
trans-unit.target: 匯入的合約名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets the contract name of the import to the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 將匯入的合約名稱設定為指定的字串。

trans-unit.source: An import builder containing the contract name that allows for further configuration.
trans-unit.target: 內含合約名稱，允許進一步設定的匯入產生器。

trans-unit.source: Configures the import to receive a collection of exports.
trans-unit.target: 設定要接收匯出集合的匯入。

trans-unit.source: An import builder that can receive a collection of exports and allows for further configuration.
trans-unit.target: 可以接收匯出集合，且允許進一步設定的匯入產生器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to provide all available matching exports; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要提供所有可用的相符匯出，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Configures the import to receive a collection of exports, possibly representing all available matching exports.
trans-unit.target: 設定要接收匯出集合 (可能表示所有可用的相符匯出) 的匯入。

trans-unit.source: An import builder that can receive a collection of exports and allows for further configuration.
trans-unit.target: 可以接收匯出集合，且允許進一步設定的匯入產生器。
